description: Main entry point for a Flutter application setting up a basic app with a title and loading indicator.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget for the Flutter app, configuring theme and home page.

classes.name: MyHomePage

classes.name: _MyHomePageState
classes.description: State class managing the UI of MyHomePage.

methods.name: main

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method for each widget, constructing the UI components.
